name: Tail Slap
summary: Deals damage; is a multi-turn attack. 33.3% it will hit twice, 33.3% it hits 3 times, and 16.7% chance it will hit four or five times.
viability: Tail Slap is a very good move to run on Minccino and Cinccino, as both get Skill Link. Even Technician varians can make use of it, due to each strike getting a boost. Either way, it's a must run.
